alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 10:36PM CST until January 20 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 10 AM EST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi
